attributes.action: Stop the Increase of UK Spouse Visa Financial Requirements.
attributes.additional_details: Cancel the uplift in the income requirements to sponsor a foreign national and leave the rates frozen at the current level. Its already hard enough for the "standard" class to do things they enjoy with tax increases and the cost of living. Nevermind the government now making love a unrealistic dream!
attributes.background: As a citezen of the United Kingdom, myself and others should have a fundermental right to be able to be with the people we love. The current European Human rights act even covers the right to family life. This major uplift in income requirments to sponsor a foreign partner needs to be abolished!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652602
